Having regard to Council Regulation (EC) No 1049/2001 of 22 December 2001 on the protection of natural persons with regard to the processing of personal data by the Community institutions and bodies and on the free movement of such data, and in particular Article 4 thereof, as last amended by Regulation (EU) No 182/2011 of the European Parliament and of the Council of 16 February 2011 laying down the rules and general principles concerning mechanisms for control by the Member States of the Commission's exercise of implementing powers (OJ L 55, 28.2.2011, p. 1). See the application lodged on 1 February 2022 with which the company Amgen Europe B.V. has requested the reclassification, for the purpose of reimbursement, of the medicinal product Lumykras (sotorasib); See the opinions expressed by the Scientific and Technical Advisory Committee at the meeting of 2 to 4 May 2022 and at the session of 3 to 5 April 2023; See the opinion of the Committee on Prices and Refunds at the Meeting of 12 to 15 January 2024; See the decision of the Council of 10 April 2024 on the Medicinal Product for Human Use "MEDterM001", approved by the centralised procedure; See also the application submitted on 1 January 2022 with the request for re-classification at the end of the re-qualification of the medical product "Medterm001" at the hearing of the Commission of the European Communities at the sitting of 11 May 2022, published in the Gazzetta Ufficiale della Repubblica Italiana - Serie generale n. 109 dell'11 maggio 2022, recante Classificazione, ai sensi dell'art.
